story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_0200_10: Please, no need to be so rough!
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Shut up! We’re not even pulling that hard!
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
What business would a merchant like you
have with us?
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Well, actually, I was hoping to propose a
small deal.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Gehehe, seriously? What, you wanna sell
us potions or something?
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_0900_10:
We find you snooping around our top-secret
sector, yet you wish to strike a deal?
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Why don’t you just confess and tell us what
you were going to steal.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I wasn’t doing anything! I was just lost and
didn’t know the area was important.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I don’t believe a word of it. There’s no way
to know what he’s up to.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Please give the order, boss. I, Proton, will
take care of him.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: Please, have mercy! Hear me out!
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’m sure I know a thing or two that might
interest you!
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1800_10: intel on how to use sync stones ultimate!
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
You must be finding it hard to analyze them,
given your strained relationship with the
person in charge of Pasio.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
However, I may be able to provide you
information.
story_arceus_06_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: What do you think? Not a bad offer?
